body_html:
I managed to hack around this by manually setting configure.py:

_DEFAULT_CUDA_VERSION = '9.0'

to

_DEFAULT_CUDA_VERSION = '9.1'

However, it would be nice if the script was updated to read the export variables correctly again. 👍
body_text:
I managed to hack around this by manually setting configure.py:
_DEFAULT_CUDA_VERSION = '9.0'

to

body:
I managed to hack around this by manually setting [configure.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure.py#L39):
```
_DEFAULT_CUDA_VERSION = '9.0'
```
to
```
_DEFAULT_CUDA_VERSION = '9.1'
```

However, it would be nice if the script was updated to read the export variables correctly again. 👍
